snippet: Vikings running back Adrian Peterson, the reigning N.F.L. most valuable player, will make his preseason debut next Sunday at San Francisco, Coach Leslie Frazier said.
abstract: Minnesota Vikings running back Adrian Peterson, reigning NFL most valuable player, will make his preseason debut at San Francisco; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Vikings running back Adrian Peterson, the reigning N.F.L. most valuable player, will make his preseason debut next Sunday at San Francisco, Coach Leslie Frazier said.
